verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַרְבַּ֔ע <S%H702><s%> And it came to pass in the fourth לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> Darius הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [that] the word יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זְכַרְיָ֗ה <S%H2148><s%> came unto Zechariah בְּאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <S%H702><s%> in the fourth לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַתְּשִׁעִ֖י <S%H8671><s%> [day] of the ninth בְּכִסְלֵֽו׃ <S%H3691><s%> [even] in Chisleu

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> When they had sent בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> Bethel שַׂר־ אֶ֕צֶר <S%H8272><s%> Sherezer וְרֶ֥גֶם מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H7278><s%> and Regemmelech וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֑יו <S%H582><s%> and their men לְחַלּ֖וֹת <S%H2470><s%> to pray אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> [And] to speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> which [were] in the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> and to the prophets לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַֽאֶבְכֶּה֙ <S%H1058><s%> Should I weep בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִשִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> in the fifth הִנָּזֵ֕ר <S%H5144><s%> separating כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> myself as I have done זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> these כַּמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> many שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> whole age פ
וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto me saying

אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> and to the priests לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When צַמְתֶּ֨ם <S%H6684><s%> When ye fasted וְסָפ֜וֹד <S%H5594><s%> and mourned בַּחֲמִישִׁ֣י <S%H2549><s%> in the fifth וּבַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> and seventh וְזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> these שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> [month] even those seventy שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years הֲצ֥וֹם <S%H6684><s%> did ye at all צַמְתֻּ֖נִי <S%H6684><s%> fast אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> When תֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> And when ye did eat וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תִשְׁתּ֑וּ <S%H8354><s%> and when ye did drink הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <S%H398><s%> did not ye eat וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you הַשֹּׁתִֽים׃ <S%H8354><s%> [for yourselves] and drink

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <S%H1697><s%> [Should ye] not [hear] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> hath cried יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֔ים <S%H7223><s%> the former בִּהְי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> when Jerusalem יֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> was inhabited וּשְׁלֵוָ֔ה <S%H7961><s%> and in prosperity וְעָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H5892><s%> and the cities סְבִיבֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5439><s%> thereof round about her וְהַנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <S%H8219><s%> and the foothills יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> when [men] inhabited פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> came unto Zechariah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מִשְׁפַּ֤ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> true. שְׁפֹ֔טוּ <S%H8199><s%> Execute וְחֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy וְרַֽחֲמִ֔ים <S%H7356><s%> and compassions עֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> and shew אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> to his brother

וְאַלְמָנָ֧ה <S%H490><s%> not the widow וְיָת֛וֹם <S%H3490><s%> nor the fatherless גֵּ֥ר <S%H1616><s%> the stranger וְעָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> nor the poor אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲשֹׁ֑קוּ <S%H6231><s%> And oppress וְרָעַת֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּחְשְׁב֖וּ <S%H2803><s%> and let none of you imagine בִּלְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> in your heart

וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <S%H3985><s%> But they refused לְהַקְשִׁ֔יב <S%H7181><s%> to hearken וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> and turned כָתֵ֖ף <S%H3802><s%> the shoulder סֹרָ֑רֶת <S%H5637><s%> A stubborn וְאָזְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H241><s%> their ears הִכְבִּ֥ידוּ <S%H3513><s%> and stopped מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> that they should not hear

וְלִבָּ֞ם <S%H3820><s%> their hearts שָׂ֣מוּ <S%H7760><s%> Yea they made שָׁמִ֗יר <S%H8068><s%> [as] an adamant stone מִ֠שְּׁמוֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> lest they should hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָ֤ה <S%H8451><s%> the law וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1697><s%> and the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁלַ֜ח <S%H7971><s%> hath sent יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּרוּח֔וֹ <S%H7307><s%> in his spirit בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by הַנְּבִיאִ֣ים <S%H5030><s%> prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֑ים <S%H7223><s%> the former וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came קֶ֣צֶף <S%H7110><s%> wrath גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> therefore came a great מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become כַאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he קָרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> Therefore it is come to pass [that] as he cried וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> and they would not hear כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> so יִקְרְאוּ֙ <S%H7121><s%> so they cried וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶשְׁמָ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> and I would not hear אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וְאֵ֣סָעֲרֵ֗ם <S%H5590><s%> But I scattered them with a whirlwind עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> among כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> among all the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדָע֔וּם <S%H3045><s%> whom they knew וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> not Thus the land נָשַׁ֣מָּה <S%H8047><s%> desolate אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H310><s%> after מֵֽעֹבֵ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> them that no man passed through וּמִשָּׁ֑ב <S%H7725><s%> nor returned וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> for they laid אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> land חֶמְדָּ֖ה <S%H2532><s%> the pleasant לְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <S%H8074><s%> was desolate פ
